WorkItem.ClosedComment: The Unrelenting Blade shows up due to the new filter "BoE Items (possible AH)", if you turn this one off it'll be gone.The filters for the different Tiers are all on in Rawr3, turn them off there and then save the char and they'll stay off.
WorkItem.Description: Even after filtering out items, the Upgrade List optimizer works with items dropping from zones not checked in the item filter list. Adding a ZIP file with XML (as requested on EJ forums) and a screenshot showing the standalone version calculating Unrelenting Blade from Halls of Stone even though I've filtered out all Dungeons.
